entry.tran: （与形容词连用，描述头发的长度、颜色或发型）表示“…头发的”
entry.def: -haired combines with adjectives to describe the length, colour, or type of hair that someone has.

example.ex: He was a small, dark-haired man.
example.tran: 他是个身材矮小的黑发男子。
